Text:
Может, кто-нибудь займётся сведением русских звуковых дорожек (дублированных и с переводом Hige) и совместит их с WEB-DL-ами?

Maybe anyone will synchronize russian audio tracks (dubbed and Hige voice-over) with these WEB-DLs?

These episodes seem a bit large- I have some 720p versions from months ago that have the full 5.1 audio and the episodes range from 400 to 500 megs. Any chance of someone sharing the last 8 or so episodes with the 5.1 audio in 720p?
